summary: Martin, a mercenary, is sent from Europe by a mysterious biotech company to the Tasmanian wilderness on a hunt for the last Tasmanian tiger.
cast: Willem Dafoe|Frances O'Connor|Sam Neill|Morgan Davies|Finn Woodlock|Jacek Koman|Callan Mulvey|John Brumpton|Dan Wyllie|Sullivan Stapleton|Jamie Timony|Dan Spielman|Maia Thomas|Marc Watson-Paul
